Package gamePlay

Class Player

java.lang.Object
gamePlay.Player
public class Player extends Object
Provides utilities to create and handle a player
Author:
Group 46

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Player(int _credit)
    Player constructor
    Initialize a player with the initial credit, an empty hand and sets the default bet to 5

    • setHand

      public void setHand(ArrayList<Card> cards, boolean[] hold_index)
      Replaces the discarded cards by new ones
      Parameters:
      cards - ArrayList of cards for the hand
      hold_index - A boolean array. If true then hold that index card in hand, else put the dealt cards
